summary: THE CAR RANDOMLY ACCELERATES AFTER DEPRESSING THE BRAKE.  IT BUCKS, REVS, LURKS THEN STOPS.  IT HAS HAPPENED ABOUT 4 TIME TO-DATE.  TODAY, 6/20, I TAPPED THE CAR IN FRONT OF ME.  NO DAMAGED BUT IT IS THE CLOSES TO HAVING AN ACCIDENT SINCE I NOTICED THIS ISSUE.  TOOK THE VEHICLE TO PACIFICO FORD IN PA TO HAVE THE ISSUE CHECKED OUT AND THEY FOUND NOTHING.  THAT WAS ON 5/23.  PLAN TO TAKE IT BACK THERE AGAIN.
